languages.text: "Они и должны бояться!" {n}Винтерскейл ревет, и громогласное эхо рассыпается по лесам.{/n} "Я Вольный Торговец, воин Императора, великий правитель своей династии. Они должны трепетать предо мной и падать ниц, едва распознав мой гнев. И молить о милости!"

traits.locale_text: "Они и должны бояться!" {n}Винтерскейл ревет, и громогласное эхо рассыпается по лесам.{/n} "Я Вольный Торговец, воин Императора, великий правитель своей династии. Они должны трепетать предо мной и падать ниц, едва распознав мой гнев. И молить о милости!"

languages.text: "As they should be!" {n}Winterscale roars, and a loud echo rolls through the forest.{/n} "I am a Rogue Trader, warrior of the God-Emperor and the great ruler of my dynasty. They should tremble and prostrate themselves before me at the slightest sign of my anger, and beg for forgiveness!"
languages.original_text: "Они и должны бояться!" {n}Винтерскейл ревет, и громогласное эхо рассыпается по лесам.{/n} "Я Вольный Торговец, воин Императора, великий правитель своей династии. Они должны трепетать предо мной и падать ниц, едва распознав мой гнев. И молить о милости!"

traits.locale_text: "They should be afraid! {n}Winterscale roars, and a loud echo rolls thorough the forest.{/n}"I am the Rogue Trader, a warrior of the God-Emperor and the great ruler of my Dynasty. They should tremble and prostrate themselves before me at the slightest hint of my rage, and beg for forgiveness!"

"They should be afraid! {n}Winterscale roars, and a loud echo rolls thorough the forest.{/n}"I am the Rogue Trader, a warrior of the God-Emperor and the great ruler of my Dynasty. They should tremble and prostrate themselves before me at the slightest hint of my rage, and beg for forgiveness!"

"They should be afraid!" {n}Winterscale roars, and a loud echo rolls through the forest.{/n}"I am the Rogue Trader, a warrior of the God-Emperor and the great ruler of my Dynasty. They should tremble and prostrate themselves before me at the slightest hint of my rage, and beg for forgiveness!"

"They should be afraid!" {n}Winterscale roars, and a loud echo rolls through the forest.{/n}"I am the Rogue Trader, a warrior of the God-Emperor and the great ruler of my Dynasty. They should tremble and prostrate themselves before me at the slightest hint of my rage, and beg for forgiveness!"

"As they should be!" {n}Winterscale roars, and a loud echo rolls through the forest.{/n} "I am a Rogue Trader, warrior of the God-Emperor and the great ruler of my dynasty. They should tremble and prostrate themselves before me at the slightest sign of my anger, and beg for forgiveness!"

"As they should be!" {n}Winterscale roars, and a loud echo rolls through the forest.{/n} "I am a Rogue Trader, warrior of the God-Emperor and the great ruler of my dynasty. They should tremble and prostrate themselves before me at the slightest sign of my anger, and beg for forgiveness!"

languages.text: «¡Como debe ser!», {n}ruge Winterscale, y su grito reverbera por todo el bosque.{/n} «Soy un Comerciante Independiente, guerrero del Dios Emperador e ilustre soberano de mi dinastía. ¡Deberían echarse a temblar ante el más mínimo indicio de mi cólera, postrarse ante mí y rogar mi perdón!».
languages.original_text: "As they should be!" {n}Winterscale roars, and a loud echo rolls through the forest.{/n} "I am a Rogue Trader, warrior of the God-Emperor and the great ruler of my dynasty. They should tremble and prostrate themselves before me at the slightest sign of my anger, and beg for forgiveness!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Y deberían tenerlo!», {n}ruge Winterscale, y su grito reverbera por todo el bosque.{/n}»Soy un Comerciante Independiente, guerrero del Dios Emperador e ilustre soberano de mi dinastía. ¡Deberían echarse a temblar ante el más mínimo indicio de mi cólera, postrarse ante mí y rogar mi perdón!».

languages.text: “他们就应该害怕我才对！”{n}温特斯凯尔咆哮道，嘹亮的吼声滚过森林。{/n}“我是行商浪人，是神皇的战士，也是王朝伟大的统治者。只要我稍微流露出一丝愤怒，他们就该在我面前战栗拜倒，乞求我的原谅！”
languages.original_text: "As they should be!" {n}Winterscale roars, and a loud echo rolls through the forest.{/n} "I am a Rogue Trader, warrior of the God-Emperor and the great ruler of my dynasty. They should tremble and prostrate themselves before me at the slightest sign of my anger, and beg for forgiveness!"

traits.locale_text: “他们就应该害怕我才对！”{n}温特斯凯尔咆哮道，嘹亮的吼声滚过森林。{/n}“我是行商浪人，是神皇的战士，也是王朝伟大的统治者。只要我稍微流露出一丝愤怒，他们就该在我面前战栗拜倒，乞求我的原谅！”

languages.text: « Comme il se doit ! {n}rugit Winterscale, dont la voix résonne dans la forêt.{/n} Je suis un libre-marchand, un guerrier de l'Empereur-Dieu et le dirigeant suprême de ma dynastie. Il est bien normal qu'ils tremblent et se prosternent devant moi au moindre signe de colère, en me suppliant de leur pardonner ! »
languages.original_text: "As they should be!" {n}Winterscale roars, and a loud echo rolls through the forest.{/n} "I am a Rogue Trader, warrior of the God-Emperor and the great ruler of my dynasty. They should tremble and prostrate themselves before me at the slightest sign of my anger, and beg for forgiveness!"

traits.locale_text: « Comme il se doit ! {n}rugit Winterscale, dont la voix résonne dans la forêt.{/n} Je suis un libre-marchand, un guerrier de l'Empereur-Dieu et le dirigeant suprême de ma dynastie. Il est bien normal qu'ils tremblent et se prosternent devant moi au moindre signe de colère, en me suppliant de leur pardonner ! »

languages.text: 「恐れるべきなのだ！」{n}ウィンタースケールが咆哮し、大音響が森に響き渡る。{/n}「俺は自由開拓者、神帝陛下の戦士であり、我が王朝の偉大なる支配者だ。ヤツらは俺の怒りの気配に震え、ひれ伏し、許しを請うべきだ！」
languages.original_text: "As they should be!" {n}Winterscale roars, and a loud echo rolls through the forest.{/n} "I am a Rogue Trader, warrior of the God-Emperor and the great ruler of my dynasty. They should tremble and prostrate themselves before me at the slightest sign of my anger, and beg for forgiveness!"

traits.locale_text: 「恐れるべきなのだ！」{n}ウィンタースケールが咆哮し、大音響が森に響き渡る。{/n}「俺は自由開拓者、神帝陛下の戦士であり、我が王朝の偉大なる支配者だ。ヤツらは俺の怒りの気配に震え、ひれ伏し、許しを請うべきだ！」

languages.text: "Das sollten sie auch!" {n}Winterzunders Brüllen jagt ein lautes Echo durch den Wald.{/n} "Ich bin der Freihändler, ein Krieger des Gottimperators und der große Herrscher meiner Dynastie. Sie sollten beim kleinsten Anzeichen meiner Wut erzittern und sich vor mir auf die Knie werfen und um Vergebung winseln!"
languages.original_text: "As they should be!" {n}Winterscale roars, and a loud echo rolls through the forest.{/n} "I am a Rogue Trader, warrior of the God-Emperor and the great ruler of my dynasty. They should tremble and prostrate themselves before me at the slightest sign of my anger, and beg for forgiveness!"

traits.locale_text: "Sie sollten Angst haben!" {n}Winterzunders Brüllen jagt ein lautes Echo durch den Wald.{/n} "Ich bin der Freihändler, ein Krieger des Gottimperators und der große Herrscher meiner Dynastie. Sie sollten beim kleinsten Anzeichen meiner Wut erzittern und sich vor mir auf die Knie werfen und um Vergebung winseln!"

languages.text: "Tam da olması gerektiği gibi!" {n}Winterscale'in kükremesiyle ormanda gürültülü bir yankı kopuyor.{/n} "Ben bir Hür Tacirim. Tanrı İmparator'un bir savaşçısı ve hanedanlığımın ulu hükümdarıyım. Öfkemin en ufak bir emaresinde bile karşımda tir tir titremeleri ve yere kapanıp af dilemeleri gerekir."
languages.original_text: "As they should be!" {n}Winterscale roars, and a loud echo rolls through the forest.{/n} "I am a Rogue Trader, warrior of the God-Emperor and the great ruler of my dynasty. They should tremble and prostrate themselves before me at the slightest sign of my anger, and beg for forgiveness!"
